name: XY Adviser
description: XY Adviser is a community of financial advisors driving the positive evolution of financial advice. Share and learn from other world leading financial advisers, and discover the best strategies, tips, and tricks to provide the most valuable advice for your clients.  We believe in social media being used for good. As social networks have become a staple in our lives, we are starting to see how each platform curates a certain mindframe. We believe in curating an environment where financial advisors can come and contribute to a collective professional good, and raise the bar of what it means to give great financial advice together. Moving forward, the time you spend on social media wont need to be time wasted.   Download XY Adviser and participate in an environment to help you improve your professional life.
